quotes.message: aughter is the best medicine - unless you're diabetic, then insulin comes pretty high on the list.
quotes.name: Jasper Carrott

quotes.message: Laughter is the sun that drives winter from the human face.
quotes.name: Victor Hugo

quotes.message: Laughter connects you with people. It's almost impossible to maintain any kind of distance or any sense of social hierarchy when you're just howling with laughter. Laughter is a force for democracy.
quotes.name: John Cleese

quotes.message: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
quotes.name: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.message: Laughter is the sensation of feeling good all over and showing it principally in one place.
quotes.name: Josh Billings

quotes.message: Laughter is not at all a bad beginning for a friendship, and it is far the best ending for one.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Laughter is good for you. Nine out of ten stand-up comedians recommend laughter in the face of intense stupidity.
quotes.name: Jim Butcher

quotes.message: I know why we laugh. We laugh because it hurts, and it's the only thing to make it stop hurting.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors.
quotes.name: Norman Cousins

quotes.message: A day without laughter is like living in darkness; you try to find your way around, but you can't see clearly.
quotes.name: Emily Mitchell

quotes.message: Laughter is an instant vacation.
quotes.name: Milton Berle

quotes.message: Laughter feels like our flotation device -- it won't pull us out of the storm, but it might carry us through, if we can just hang on.
quotes.name: Emery Lord

quotes.message: Laughter has no foreign accent.
quotes.name: Paul Lowney

quotes.message: Everybody laughs the same in every language because laughter is a universal connection.
quotes.name: Yakov Smirnoff

quotes.message: At the height of laughter, the universe is flung into a kaleidoscope of new possibilities.
quotes.name: Jean Huston

quotes.message: You don't stop laughing because you grow old. You grow old because you stop laughing.
quotes.name: Michael Pritchard

quotes.message: A good laugh heals a lot of hurts.
quotes.name: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.message: I'm not up for laughing, but their laughter makes the room feel safer, so we begin to explore.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: Laughter does not deny pain. Laughter - like a wail - acknowledges and replies to pain.
quotes.name: Tim O'Brien

quotes.message: Laughter is a tranquilizer with no side effects.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.message: Laughter is a sense of proportion and a power of seeing yourself from the outside.
quotes.name: Zero Mostel

quotes.message: Laughter brings out the child in all of us.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: Laughter is much more important than applause. Applause is almost a duty. Laughter is a reward.
quotes.name: Carol Channing

quotes.message: The house of laughter makes a house of woe.
quotes.name: Edward Young

quotes.message: Laughter lets me relax.
quotes.name: Odette Pollar

quotes.message: Laughter serves as a blocking agent. Like a bulletproof vest, it may help protect you against the ravages of negative emotions that can assault you in disease.
quotes.name: Norman Cousins

quotes.message: There is little success where there is little laughter.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Laughter is the foundation of reconciliation.
quotes.name: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.message: Laughter is by definition healthy.
quotes.name: Doris Lessing
